name: Desires of the Amazons
description:
Desires of the Amazons is a transformative erotic RPG for adults.

You are a knight sent to fight the Amazons. But you fall into an ambush by wicked witch Cassandra which forces you to serve her, while you find yourself slowly turning into a woman. For Cassandra, you will have to collect magical plants, learn how to mix magical potions, which will transform your body in various ways after drinking them. Hordes of enemies, a large number of dungeons, potion making, weapons, clothes, intimate lingerie, sex toys, plenty of different characters, conversations and quests that can be completed in multiple ways are waiting for you.

Although you are initially humiliated as a man by the Amazons, by gradually transforming into a woman and completing quests, you will experience a riches of extraordinary sexual practices. It doesn't matter whether you accept your transformation and desire to become an Amazon or fight against it. The witch Cassandra subjugates you, the other characters respond appropriately to your behavior and over time you find that you like it and even find your female form arousing.
